projectGridLines.stationName: MSCI Services Pvt. Ltd. - Index Management Research
projectGridLines.title: Title: Creation and maintenance of MSCI Equity & Fixed Income Indexes
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Creation and maintenance of MSCI Equity & Fixed Income Indexes

Description: Constructing and rebalancing the MSCI Equity & Fixed Income Indexes in accordance with the index methodology

  • Detailed understanding of the index rebalancing framework and capabilities, in order to support the development and maintenance of MSCI indexes
  • Understand the rules for constructing and maintaining the index.
  • Understand global Equity & Fixed Income Markets
  • Knowledge of financial ratios, portfolio management

Knowledge of coding required for back testing of index methodologies & automation

Skill sets: Coding skills (preferably python & SQL); Excellent verbal & written communication skills

Expected learning: 

Specific courses required for project execution:  Coding skills (preferably python & SQL)
